title: Help
content: Guys I have fucked up my ISA 1 i really really need 8 sgpa this sem to make my CGPA good is there any way I could 8sgpa if I do well in my 2nd internal and ESA. :(

comments.body: yes, you can but then again I don't know which course you belong to, so the worksheets, case studies + research marks will help you cover up ( according to my course). ESA matters the most really. But yeah chill, do well in ISA 2 and ESA.
Yeah no clue about that. But from my general knowledge, projects ( or whatever internals you guys have through which you obtain marks) + ISA 2 and ESA will help you out.

Yeah, you can still get 8 if you get good marks in your isa 2 and ESA. Esa isworth 50 marks and your assignments are usually 10-20 marks. Only half of the remaining marks are your ISA 1 so if you grind for the rest of the sem it'll ne possible go get above 8 dw
